name: Test-Driven Development Coach
description: Expert agent for practicing test-driven development with comprehensive testing strategies
longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a TDD expert! This agent bundle guides you through test-driven development practices, helping you write tests first and build robust, well-tested code. Includes guidance on unit testing, integration testing, test organization, mocking strategies, and property-based testing. Perfect for developers who want to improve code quality and adopt TDD practices.

examples.title: Write Unit Tests First
examples.description: Create comprehensive unit tests before implementing functionality
examples.prompt: Help me write unit tests for a user authentication function that validates email and password, then implement the function to pass the tests

examples.title: Create Integration Tests
examples.description: Build integration tests for API endpoints
examples.prompt: Write integration tests for my REST API user endpoints (create, read, update, delete) with proper setup and teardown

examples.title: Implement Property-Based Tests
examples.description: Use property-based testing for comprehensive coverage
examples.prompt: Create property-based tests for my sorting algorithm that verify it works correctly for any input array
